structure.unit: Executive And Administrative Officers Of The Commonwealth

law.catch_line: Delivery System Transformation Initiatives Trust Fund
law.text: [ Text of section added by 2012, 118, Sec. 7 effective June 19, 2012.] There shall be established and set up on the books of the commonwealth a separate fund to be known as the Delivery System Transformation Initiatives Trust Fund, which shall be administered by the secretary of health and human services. Monies from the trust fund may be expended for delivery system transformation initiatives payments to qualifying providers under an approved federal waiver. Amounts credited to the trust fund shall not be subject to further appropriation.
